author: Staff Reporter
text: As part of the 33{+r}{+d}annual celebration of the National Day for Mentally Retarded Persons, the Tambaram Parents’ Association for the Mentally Retarded will organise a series of events including a march past by children from different schools at Shivalayaa, Vels University in Pallavaram at 9.30 a.m. on Saturday. An exhibition on teaching aids for the children, a drawing competition, will be organised.
title: Expo, rally on Saturday
